title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

items.content_html: Not voting for someone coz he’s not going to win is saying your vote doesn’t matter. Your vote is your voice, not a bet on who will win.

items.content_html:
Tinawagan ung kapatid ko twice ng recruitment ng HP:

Guy: Hi, this is X from Hewlett-Packard. Has someone from our company already called you today?

Alvin: Um, opo kanina po

Guy: I see, naalala mo ba pangalan?

Alvin: Hindi eh Guy: Was it a guy or a girl?

Alvin: Guy Guy: Was it me?!?
items.summary:
Tinawagan ung kapatid ko twice ng recruitment ng HP:
Guy: Hi, this is X from Hewlett-Packard. Has someone from our company already called you today?
Alvin: Um, opo kanina po
Guy: I see, naalala mo ba pangalan?
Alvin: Hindi eh Guy: Was it a guy or a girl?
Alvin: Guy Guy: Was it me?!?
